remarks: The indexed union of a set of ordinal numbers ` B ( x ) ` is an ordinal number.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2016.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
